column5: Maybe he does get it. Maybe he even cares about you more than you know. But let me tell you from personal experience that all the care in the world doesn't always help to numb the endless pain one endures. But your friend seems to be very lucky that he has someone looking out for him as much as you seem to do. I wish you and your friend all the luck for the new year and i hope he gets better
Off topic question: isn't this picture or these kind of pictures from some kinda app where you write something and it puts a picture under it that fits the text? What was the name of it if so?
